title: Samsung Galaxy A51 review: almost

It has a 48-megapixel camera, 4,000mAh battery, and is part of a big push to make Samsung's most popular phone line worldwide more common in the US. Samsung's mantra is that it has an "awesome screen, awesome camera, long-lasting battery life," but not all of those claims are true, as you'll see in this review.
